author: By Kate Springer, CNN
title: As China lifts restrictions, here's where its people want to travel
description: Even though life in China is slowly returning to normal and citizens are ready to travel, the majority of post-COVID-19 trips will most likely be taken at home -- not abroad. Travel experts discuss what lies ahead for the world's largest outbound travel marke…
content:
(CNN) As China slowly eases lockdown restrictions and life returns to somewhat normal conditions, residents have once again started traveling. 
But an uptick in domestic sight-seeing doesn't necessarily mean international travel will rebound as quickly.
